p: Hypothesis 3. On PET scans ( 18F-Florbetapir, 0â€“78 weeks), patients treated with valacyclovir will show less amyloid accumulation than patients treated with placebo on the sum of six ROIs (cerebellar reference) known to show increased uptake in AD: medial orbital frontal, anterior cingulate, parietal, temporal, posterior cingulate, precuneus.
